game.l_dis:
G-Switch 3 â€“ Flip Gravity, Outrun Obstacles

G-Switch 3 takes the beloved gravity-flipping formula to new heights. With Campaign, Endless, and Tournament modes, this futuristic runner challenges your reflexes and precision as you flip between walls, ceilings, and floors to survive.

What is G-Switch 3?

G-Switch 3 is the third installment in the popular action-runner series. It adds new level designs, more intense challenges, and local multiplayer tournaments for up to 4 players. Players can also collect secret orbs to unlock hidden characters in some versions.

How to Play G-Switch 3?

  • Tap/Click: Flip gravity to move between the floor, walls, and ceiling.
  • Avoid Traps: Watch out for lasers, gaps, and crushing hazards.
  • Campaign Mode: Progress through structured levels with increasing difficulty.
  • Endless Mode: Run as far as you can in a never-ending challenge.
  • Multiplayer Tournament: Compete with up to 4 friends on the same device.
  • Collect Orbs: Unlock bonus characters by finding secret orbs.

Key Features

  • Gravity Flipping Action: Simple one-tap control, infinite challenge.
  • Campaign & Endless Modes: Play structured missions or test survival skills.
  • Multiplayer Tournaments: Up to 4 players on one device.
  • Hidden Unlocks: Collect orbs to reveal new characters.
  • Unblocked Access: Jump in instantly from your browser.
